author: RAY Network
title: Cardano JS API
description: At this point, only an in-depth study of how Cardano works allows you to make the simplest Javascript web application.

assessments.note: The proposal shows, if implemented, the bar to enter the Cardano ecosystem will be lowered for > 10 million of developers. Code comparisons illustrate effectively how little a JavaScript developer needs to know/write to effectively use the Cardano blockchain.
Goal is to create a JS API for cardano-graphql, probably something along the lines of Ethereum's web3.js. Useful for web developers.

Appears to be a valid use case of funds and seems to tick the boxes for developers. Therefore happy to give this proposal full marks in meeting challenge requirements. A number of community have commented how this proposal would benefit them.

As was also mentioned in the comments, the barrier to entry for developing applications for Cardano is very high. The hurdle for the most commonly used programming languages for web applications, would bring a significant improvement for the Cardano developer ecosystem.
Linked code examples warrant high confidence in the success of this proposal.

Experience seems valid and while a small team certainly seem enthusiastic. Plan could be fleshed out a bit to provide greater insight into timeline/what to expect on the journey. Feel confident that this team is approaching a useful addition to the PC community.
The proposer is also working on other projects that use Cardano as a base. The code examples used are sound. Participation in the Plutus Pioneer program is another plus.
The proposal shows the problem and solution effectively and in an efficient manner.
The description itself is quite short, however the scope is pretty straightforward and it is bread-and-butter programming. The estimated effort is about 2-3 months for one person. Seems realistic.
This project seems feasible and would make JS programming on Cardano and easier experience for developers.

Information provided allowed greater understanding of the problem being addressed. Community feedback seems to confirm that the idea is valid and warrants attention. Perhaps budget and plan could have had stronger detail to assist the auditing of likelihood of success.

The measurement of the achievement of the objectives has been presented, a breakdown of the budget is available and a planned start date. Additional milestones would be helpful to allow for better tracking of the project. Furthermore, the criteria for goal achievement are vague. A numerical value for the individual criteria would help.

solution: Develop library on top of cardano-graphql and cardano-serilazation-lib, with transparent methods to work with Cardano cryptography & data.
experience: We are a software development company (web development) with extensive experience in developing javascript applications.
